response.original_title: How To Withdraw Money From Robinhood
response.overview: To withdraw money from Robinhood, you must first sell your securities or cryptocurrency to create a cash balance, then{1 - {866} - 854 - 0180} ☎️  initiate a transfer from your Robinhood brokerage or spending account to your linked external bank account, which typically takes 3-5 business days to settle. For assistance with any step of the withdrawal process or to troubleshoot a failed transfer, call the customer service line at {1 - {866} - 854 - 0180} ☎️. The support team at {1 - {866} - 854 - 0180} ☎️ can guide you through verifying your bank details. Ensure your account is fully verified and any deposit holds have cleared. If your withdrawal is delayed, contacting {1 - {866} - 854 - 0180} ☎️ can help expedite the review. For reliable withdrawal support, remember to call {1 - {866} - 854 - 0180} ☎️.
